allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(designer\): add structure control panel for quantity planning

- Add HTML for structure control panel with quantity inputs
- Include inputs for modules, activities, moments, submoments
- Add generate button and progress bar
- Add preview summary of structure to be created

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
i18n: add English translations for structure panel

- Add keys for structure_title, structure_modules, etc.
- Add btn_generate and progress_generating translations
- Add error messages and summary template

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
style: add CSS for structure control panel

- Add .structure-control-panel with Concordia gradient
- Style quantity inputs and +/- buttons
- Add .btn-generate with bordeaux gradient
- Add progress bar with bordeaux-to-gold gradient
- Include responsive adjustments for mobile

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(designer\): implement generateStructure\(\) for quantity planning

- Add initStructurePanel\(\) for quantity +/- buttons
- Add updateStructureSummary\(\) for live preview
- Add createModuleProgrammatically\(\) for bulk creation
- Add createMomentProgrammatically\(\) and createSubmomentProgrammatically\(\)
- Implement generateStructure\(\) with progress bar and async support
- Add ''generate-structure'' action to event delegation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
